name: Transform Median Life
action: Instant and contested; target rolls Stamina reflexively
effect: The mage can transform one form of median life (most mammals, fish, birds and reptiles) into another median or base life form. The mage can affect a target of Size 20 or less. If the target is larger, penalties are levied against the spellcasting roll. He transforms the target into a creature of Size typical for that type of being. A bear (Size 8) can be transformed into a cat (Size 2), but not into a Size 8 cat. Transforming a smaller creature (the cat) into a larger creature (the bear) imposes dice penalties. At this level, the mage must touch the target. With Life 4, he can cast this spell at sensory range.
